user.title: OpenData South Tyrol
user.description:
This integration uses open data provided by the Autonomous Province of Bolzano/South Tyrol through the Open Data Hub portal.

The data is released under CC0 1.0 Universal license which allows you to:
- Copy, modify, distribute and perform the work
- Use the data for commercial purposes
- All without asking for permission

For more information: data.civis.bz.it/en/info

To begin, enter a name for this integration:

language.title: Language Selection
language.description: Select the language for the data. This choice will affect the language of descriptions and content provided by the API.

group.title: Select Group
group.description: Data is organized into thematic groups. Select the data group you're interested in monitoring. This choice will determine which datasets will be available in the next step.

package.title: Select Dataset
package.description:
Choose the specific dataset to monitor within the selected group. Each dataset contains data related to a specific theme.

Current API URL: {api_url}

resource.title: Select Resource
resource.description:
Select the resource (JSON, WFS, or XLSX) you want to monitor. Resources are the actual data sources within the selected dataset.

Current API URL: {api_url}

rows.title: Select Item
rows.description:
Select from the list the specific item you want to monitor.

Current API URL: {api_url}

fields.title: Select Fields
fields.description:
For the selected item, choose which specific fields you want to monitor. These fields will become sensors in Home Assistant.

Current API URL: {api_url}

confirm.title: Confirm Configuration

error.invalid_xlsx: The XLSX file cannot be read or is invalid
error.no_fields_available: No fields available in the data
error.no_rows_available: No items available in the data
error.no_fields_selected: Please select at least one field
error.no_packages: No datasets available in the selected group
